import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const UpdateClient = (props) => { const [nama, setNama] = useState(""); const [gambar, setGambar] = useState(""); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const onChangeFile = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setGambar(e.target.files[0]); }; const changeOnClick = (e) => { const formData = new FormData(); formData.append("nama", nama); formData.append("gambar", gambar); axios .put( `http://localhost:8080/clients/update/${props.match.params.id}`, formData ) .then((res) => setMessage(res.data)) .catch((err) => { console.log(err); }); }; useEffect(() => { axios .get(`http://localhost:8080/clients/${props.match.params.id}`) .then((res) => [setNama(res.data.nama), setGambar(res.data.gambar)]) .catch((error) => console.log(error)); }, []); return (

); }; export default UpdateClient;
